scripts.cassa: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/e2e/PaymentCheck.cy.js" --browser chrome --headless && node cypress/support/open_report.js || node cypress/support/open_report.js
scripts.slider: cypress run --spec "cypress/e2e/CuracaoFunctionalFourDaily.cy.js" --env viewportWidth=1920 --env viewportHeight=1080 && node cypress/support/open_Image.js || node cypress/support/open_Image.js
scripts.updateAll: del package-lock.json && rmdir /s /q node_modules && npm install
scripts.AllRight: npx cypress run --env grepTags="@AR" --env AllLang='true' --spec "cypress/e2e/PaymentCheck.cy.js" && node cypress/support/open_report.js || node cypress/support/open_report.js
scripts.Slottica: npx cypress run --env AllLang=true --spec cypress/e2e/PaymentCheck.cy.js && node cypress/support/open_report.js || node cypress/support/open_report.js
scripts.Magic: npx cypress run --env grepTags="@Magic" --env AllLang='true' --spec "cypress/e2e/PaymentCheck.cy.js" && node cypress/support/open_report.js || node cypress/support/open_report.js
